an4.139:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these four Dharma speakers.
an4.139:4.3: One Dharma speaker speaks little and off topic.
an4.139:4.4: And their assembly can’t tell what’s on topic and what’s off topic.
an4.139:4.5: Such an assembly regards such a Dharma speaker simply as a Dharma speaker.
an4.139:5.1: One Dharma speaker speaks little but stays on topic.
an4.139:5.2: And their assembly can tell what’s on topic and what’s off topic.
an4.139:5.3: Such an assembly regards such a Dharma speaker simply as a Dharma speaker.
an4.139:6.1: One Dharma speaker speaks much but off topic.
an4.139:6.2: And their assembly can’t tell what’s on topic and what’s off topic.
an4.139:6.3: Such an assembly regards such a Dharma speaker simply as a Dharma speaker.
an4.139:7.1: One Dharma speaker speaks much and stays on topic.
an4.139:7.2: And their assembly can tell what’s on topic and what’s off topic.
an4.139:7.3: Such an assembly regards such a Dharma speaker simply as a Dharma speaker.
an4.139:7.4: These are the four Dharma speakers.”
